OOFlavorPack.PsychicRitualDef_PsylinkSki.label: psylink skip abduction
OOFlavorPack.PsychicRitualDef_PsylinkSki.description: Abduct a random hostile person from anywhere in the world, prioritizing people with psychic powers. The ritual induces a dark archotech to warp space, teleporting a distant person to the center of the ritual circle. The process causes the target to fall into a short coma.
OOFlavorPack.PsychicRitualDef_PsylinkSki.outcomeDescription: At the current ritual quality, the target will remain in a coma for {0} and will apply {1} of the psylink prioritization.
